p: Culture of Leishmania spp. were obtained from the Health Science Research Institute, Asunción, Paraguay - IICS and identified by isoenzyme analysis. The maintenance of lines, forms of cultivation and isolation of promatigotas forms of Leishmania spp. followed procedures described by Roldos et al., ( 22). The inhibitory action of these promastigotes forms were performed using the L. braziliensis (MHOM / CO / 88 / UA301) and L. infantum lines (MHOM/ES/92/BCN83), cultured at 22 °C in Schneider’s Drosophila supplemented with 20% FBS.
